title: I design products
that delight and inspire people.
hero.text: Hi! Iâ€™m a product designer based in Paris. I create user-friendly interfaces for fast-growing startups.

services.title: Services
services.description: Design that solves problems, one product at a time.

items.title: What I can do for you
items.text: Faster, better products that your users love. Here's all the services I provide:

items.title: Applications I'm fluent in
items.text: Every designer needs the right tools to do the perfect job. Thankfully, I'm multilingual.

items.title: What you can expect
items.text: I design products that are more than pretty. I make them shippable and usable.

description.title: That's me!
description.text: Over the past 12 years, I've worked with a diverse range of clients, from startups to Fortune 500 companies. I love crafting interfaces that delight users and help businesses grow.

items.text: Jade helped us build a software so intuitive that it didn't need a walkthrough. He solved complex problems with brilliant design.
